text: The Day of the Locust is a 1975 American crime drama movie directed by John Schlesinger and was based on the 1939 novel of the same name by Nathanael West. It stars William Atherton, Karen Black, Donald Sutherland, Burgess Meredith, Geraldine Page, Bo Hopkins, Billy Barty, Jackie Earle Haley, Gloria LeRoy, Norman Leavitt, Madge Kennedy and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. It was nominated for 2 Academy Awards in 1976. ==Other websites== * * Category:1975 crime drama movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by John Schlesinger Category:Movies about actors Category:Movies about prostitution Category:Movies set in the 1930s
title: The Day of the Locust (movie)
